title: Clairol Natural Instincts Loving Care Color, 075 Light Ash Brown (Pack of 3)
description: Revitalize your color with a gentle, hassle-free formula. Natural Instincts Loving Care gives you natural-looking, illuminating hair color that leaves even fine or thinning hair looking full. Gently blend away your gray—and get volume that’s hard to resist!#section-head { border-top: 1px solid #fef2d2; color: #422000; } #section-content {     font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; padding:20px; margin: 20px; color: #422000; } #section-content h1 { font-weight: bold; font-size:16px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; display: inline;  color: #422000; } #section-content h2 { font-weight: bold; font-size:14px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: #422000; } #section-content h3 { font-weight: bold; font-size:12px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; display: inline;  color: #422000; } #step { background: #ffedc3 url('http://images.amazon.com/images/G/01/hpc/detail-page/NI_LC_bkg_B001E5EBP0.jpg') repeat-x; padding:20px } #step td { font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; vertical-align:top; } #step td ul { margin: 0px; padding: 0px; } #step td ul li { color: #994c05; margin: 0px; margin-left: 15px; } .brown { color: #994c05; } #question { line-height: 20px; border-bottom: 1px solid #994c05; padding:10px 0px 10px 0px; color: #422000; } #question p { color: #994c05; } #addlinst { border-bottom: none; font-size:11px; line-height: 12px; padding:10px 0px 10px 0px; color: #994c05; } #addlinst h3 { color: #422000; } .footnote { font-size: .9em; }Revitalize your color with a gentle, hassle-free formula.Natural Instincts Loving Care gives you natural-looking, illuminating hair color that leaves even fine or thinning hair looking full. Gently blend away your gray–and get volume that's hard to resist!Full color for a full lifeNatural-looking, illuminating color to flatter your skin toneGentle formula with no ammonia or peroxideSubtle gray coverage from one-step applicationRevitalizing conditioner!

title: Indigo Wild: Zum Bar Goat's Milk Soap, Dragon's Blood 3 oz
description: Earthy, yet sweet, it breathes life into scaly skin with the restorative resin of the Dracaena tree.Saponified dragon's blood infused olive, coconut, palm & castor oils, in a goat's milk base, with pure essential oils and mineral pigments.
